participant_1.background:
My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things.
to free my mind from feeling depressed i look up at the stars at night.
I enjoy spending my free time looking for interesting things to add to my collection.
I've kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove.
i lay awake at night so i can watch the stars.

participant_2.background:
I'm trying to balance my love of eating veggies with my desire to make people laugh.
i am in the navy.
I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what.
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
i like going to the beach.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do?
I really love to go to the beach, it's so relaxing!
I love the beach too, but I don't go as often as I'd like to.
Well you should come with me next time! I'm sure you'd have fun.
I'd love that! I'm always down to try new things.
Great! I'll let you know next time I'm going.
I love trying new things, so I'm sure I'd have fun at the beach with you.
I'm glad to hear that! I always have a great time at the beach, so I'm sure you would too.
What do you like to do at the beach?
I love swimming, sunbathing, and playing in the sand.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love swimming and sunbathing too.
We should definitely go to the beach together soon!
